title: JAB Opening, Thanksgiving Recap, Church Complaints, Soul Train Awards, Alabama Shooting, Get Checked Out, Mike Espy Interview, Weekend Box Office, Closing Crew and more.
itunes:title: JAB Opening, Thanksgiving Recap, Church Complaints, Soul Train Awards, Alabama Shooting, Get Checked Out, Mike Espy Interview, Weekend Box Office, Closing Crew and more.
description:
Fool #2 does the show open and warns us about the next two weeks. The crew talk about their Thanksgiving plans and how things went down with the family. Church Complaints is done by both Fool #1 and Fool #2. Alabama police made a huge mistake. We have phrases that let you know if you have something that needs to be checked out. Mike Espy from Mississippi talks about the runoff. The weekend box office has a few good movies that need to be checked out. The close of the show has all the members giving thanks and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
